Activity: Review emails and calendar for the week. Prioritize tasks based on deadlines and importance. Briefly browse industry news for any relevant updates on EHR systems and healthcare trends.

Prepare an agenda for a meeting with the Clinical Lead @clinlead-1 to discuss the progress of EHR data collection, potential roadblocks, and gather their insights. Focus on actionable feedback and collaborative problem-solving.
Meeting with @clinlead-1. Discussed data collection progress, identified key challenges, and brainstormed solutions. Documented action items and assigned responsibilities.
Review the project plan and Gantt chart with the IT Project Manager @itpm-1 to understand timelines, resource allocation, and potential delays. Ask about the risk management plan.
Meet with @itpm-1. Discussed project timelines, resource allocation, and potential delays. Emphasized the importance of timely data collection for the influenza trend analysis.
Lunch. Catch up on personal emails and news.

Draft an email to all Registered Nurses @rn-1, @rn-2, @rn-3 requesting feedback on the EHR system's usability, workflow integration, and data entry processes. Include a link to a short, anonymous survey.
Analyze initial survey responses from nurses. Identify common themes and areas of concern. Prepare a summary report for discussion with the Clinical Lead @clinlead-1 and EHR Vendor Liaison @ehrv-1.

Review key performance indicators (KPIs) related to EHR adoption and data completeness. Identify any areas where performance is lagging. Discuss strategies for improvement with the Data Analysts @da-1, @da-2.
Prepare a brief project status update for senior management, highlighting progress, challenges, and planned activities for the upcoming week. Focus on the positive impact of the EHR on patient care.
